ms_copies_parts: Stockholm, Kungl. Musik Akad. Bibl., W4-R
Venice, Bib. Marciana, It. IV. 1255 (=11.162). Two violins parts only
sources.first_edition: April, 1767, Paris, Vénier: Op. 1 no. 6 (for title, see No. 159)
later_editions: (c. 1775), London, Welcker: Op. 1 no. 6 (for title, see No. 159)

entries.notes: Almost all the MSS. copies indicate 'Adagio'. Trio section noted for movement 3.

partial_notes: This is a string quartet entry with detailed manuscript and publication information. The autograph manuscript indicates it may have been titled as 'Sonata a quattro no. 1'.
